title: Executive Order 9239-Amending Subdivision XI of Schedule A and Revoking Paragraph 2 of Subdivision III of Schedule B of the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by paragraph Eighth, subdivision SECOND, section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 404), it is ordered as follows:
1. Subdivision XI, Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules is hereby amended by adding thereto the following paragraph:
"15. Bureau of the Census: Special agents employed in collecting cotton statistics."
2. Paragraph 2, Subdivision III of Schedule B of the Civil Service Rules is hereby revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 9239-Amending Subdivision XI of Schedule A and Revoking Paragraph 2 of Subdivision III of Schedule B of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372314
